titles.title: Recognizing and honoring the essential role of classified school education support employees through the Recognizing Inspirational School Employees Award.
Recognizing and honoring the essential role of classified school education support employees through the Recognizing Inspirational School Employees Award.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

bill.summary:
Supports the Recognizing Inspirational School Employees Award program. Urges the Department of Education, states, state educational agencies, local educational agencies, institutions of higher education, and residents to join in this observance.
Congratulates the honorees of the program.
Congratulates classified school education support employees for their ongoing contributions to education and for their role in promoting and ensuring student achievement, student safety and well-being, and building a brighter, stronger future for the nation.
